verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm רָצִ֣יתָ <WH7521> thou hast been favourable יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> unto thy land שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ <WH7725> thou hast brought back [שְׁבוּת כ] (שְׁבִ֣ית <WH7622> captive ק) יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

נָ֭שָׂאתָ <WH5375> Thou hast forgiven עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> of thy people כִּסִּ֖יתָ <WH3680> thou hast covered כָל־ <WH3605> all חַטָּאתָ֣ם <WH2403> all their sin סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אָסַ֥פְתָּ <WH622> Thou hast taken away כָל־ <WH3605> all עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5678> all thy wrath הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ <WH7725> thou hast turned מֵחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> [thyself] from the fierceness אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> of thine anger
שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ <WH7725> Turn אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ <WH3468> of our salvation וְהָפֵ֖ר <WH6565> toward us to cease כַּֽעַסְךָ֣ <WH3708> and cause thine anger עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> toward
הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> alway תֶּֽאֱנַף־ <WH599> Wilt thou be angry בָּ֑נוּ תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ <WH4900> continue אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <WH639> thine anger לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> to all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> to all
הֲֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not אַ֭תָּה <WH859> Yourself תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> us again תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ <WH2421> Wilt thou not revive וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> that thy people יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> may rejoice בָֽךְ׃
הַרְאֵ֣נוּ <WH7200> Shew יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> us thy mercy וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ <WH3468> us thy salvation תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and grant לָֽנוּ׃

אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה <WH8085> I will hear מַה־ <WH4100> what יְדַבֵּר֮ <WH1696> will speak הָאֵ֪ל ׀ <WH410> what God יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for יְדַבֵּ֬ר <WH1696> for he will speak שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> peace אֶל־ <WH413> to his עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> unto his people וְאֶל־ <WH413> to his חֲסִידָ֑יו <WH2623> and to his saints וְֽאַל־ <WH408> nay יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> but let them not turn again לְכִסְלָֽה׃ <WH3690> to folly

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <WH389> Surely קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> [is] nigh לִירֵאָ֣יו <WH3373> them that fear יִשְׁע֑וֹ <WH3468> Surely his salvation לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> may dwell כָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> him that glory בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH776> in our land
חֶֽסֶד־ <WH2617> Mercy וֶאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> and truth נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6298> are met together צֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> righteousness וְשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> and peace נָשָֽׁקוּ׃ <WH5401> have kissed
אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> Truth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תִּצְמָ֑ח <WH6779> shall spring out וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק <WH6664> and righteousness מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> from heaven נִשְׁקָֽף׃ <WH8259> shall look down

גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yea the LORD יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> shall give הַטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> [that which is] good וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ <WH776> and our land תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> shall yield יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH2981> her increase
צֶ֭דֶק <WH6664> Righteousness לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ <WH1980> shall go וְיָשֵׂ֖ם <WH7760> him and shall set לְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> [us] in the way פְּעָמָֽיו׃ <WH6471> of his steps
